title: An optimized heating source for heat-not-burn tobacco products through synergistic combustion of tobacco stalk and graphite carbon with K2CO3 catalyst
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33191-33197
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03590A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zean Wang, Jianjun Yang, Yu Zhai, Jibin Chen, Houchang Pei, Liangbo Sun, Hao Liu
The minimum ignition temperature of the blend was determined by the tobacco straw, while the burnout temperature of the samples was reduced by 60 °C due to the addition of the tobacco stalk.
